attributes.additional_details:
Music GCSE should be included in the Ebacc as it is a 'sufficiently rigorous' course.  These seem to be the criteria for inclusion in the Ebacc.

Performing - discipline to practise independently and then perform under pressure.

Composition - Composing according to a brief in a particular style/genre, applying knowledge from set works

Set works - studying 12 pieces of Music in depth, similar to studying poetry/novels in English Literature.  Students have to listen to these in the exam and answer questions, including as essay question.
